import React from 'react' import useStyles from './styles' import { Card, CardMedia , CardContent, CardActions, Typography, IconButton } from '@material-ui/core' import { AddShoppingCart } from '@material-ui/icons' const Product = ({product}) => { const classes = useStyles(); return ( <>
{product.name} {product.price}
{product.description} ) } export default Product
